title: Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses
description: These days, you have many choices regarding places to purchase glasses. A growingly popular method is through online retailers. That said, you may be reluctant to get glasses. However, experiencing certain symptoms may leave you with no other choice.  The post Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses appeared first on AV Club.
author: Contributor Content

title: Are Streaming Services Holding Us Hostage? The Case for the Return of DVDs
description: Streaming might be convenient, but as favorite shows vanish, maybe it’s time to ask -- are DVDs the real key to owning what we love? The post Are Streaming Services Holding Us Hostage? The Case for the Return of DVDs appeared first on TV Fanatic.

title: Chris Wallace Leaving CNN After Three Years as Host and Anchor
description: A veteran TV journalist is leaving the cable news game: Chris Wallace is exiting CNN after spending three years there as a host and anchor, TVLine has confirmed. Wallace told The Daily Beast (who first reported the news) that he’s looking to move to an independent platform via streaming or podcasting, since that’s “where the […]
author: Dave Nemetz

title: TVLine Items: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders Renewed, HBO Sets Celtics Documentary and More
description: Here’s something to cheer about: America’s Sweethearts: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders has been renewed for Season 2 at Netflix. Watch the announcement video above. The upcoming season will follow the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders squad from auditions to training camp and through the full NFL 2024-25 season. The seven-episode first season debuted in June 2024 and explored […]
